text: Da'uda ne akhi'a ki isa ne tuhadi durabi nu apani'am dubi'am vica samala karana di maga karake asala vica tuhade upara zulama kita hai. Ate zi'adatara hisedara (sarika) ika duje te zulama karade hana. Paratu jihare imana rakhade hana ate cage karama karade hana ajihe loka bahuta ghata hana. Ate da'uda de mana vica vicara a'i'a ki asim (isa kahani rahim) usada imatihana li'a hai tam usa ne apane raba tom mu'afi magi ate sijade vica diga pi'a (alaha vala) vapisa muri'a
